mapper.insert: INSERT INTO atai_user_competition(id, user_id, competition_id, team_id, team_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{competitionId}, #{teamId}, #{teamName}, #{date}, #{date})
mapper.select: SELECT auc.competition_id AS id, auc.team_id, auc.score, auc.team_name, ac.`name`, ac.`level`, ac.`participants`, ac.`deadline`, ac.`money` FROM `atai_user_competition` auc, atai_competition ac WHERE auc.`competition_id` = ac.`id` AND auc.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT team_name FROM atai_user_competition WHERE competition_id = #{competitionId} AND team_name like CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO atai_apply_msg(id, competition_id, sender_id, receive_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{competitionId}, #{senderId}, #{receiveId})
